BoolProperty.Name: AvaloniaUseExternalMSBuild
BoolProperty.Description: Use dotnet build instead of MSBuild

BoolProperty.Name: AvaloniaAccessUnstablePrivateApis
BoolProperty.Description: Enable access to unstable private APIs (not recommended)

EnumProperty.Name: AvaloniaXamlReportImportance
EnumProperty.Description: Provides levels of importance for Xaml Compiler messages

EnumValue.Name: Low
EnumValue.Description: Set Xaml Compiler report message to Low importance

EnumValue.Name: Normal
EnumValue.Description: Set Xaml Compiler report message to Normal importance

EnumValue.Name: High
EnumValue.Description: Set Xaml Compiler report message to High importance

EnumValue.Name: InitializeComponent
EnumValue.Description: The binding of the name to the control is done only once in InitializeComponent and is stored in a field.

EnumValue.Name: OnlyProperties
EnumValue.Description: Generator generate a Properties to binding name to control

EnumProperty.Name: AvaloniaNameGeneratorDefaultFieldModifier
EnumProperty.Description: Customize visibility Modifier of Class Field/Property

EnumValue.Name: Internal
EnumValue.Description: The type or member can be accessed by any code in the same assembly, but not from another assembly. In other words, internal types or members can be accessed from code that is part of the same compilation.

EnumValue.Name: Public
EnumValue.Description: The type or member can be accessed by any other code in the same assembly or another assembly that references it. The accessibility level of public members of a type is controlled by the accessibility level of the type itself.

EnumValue.Name: Protected
EnumValue.Description: The type or member can be accessed only by code in the same class, or in a class that is derived from that class.

EnumValue.Name: Private
EnumValue.Description: TThe type or member can be accessed by types derived from the class that are declared within its containing assembly.

StringProperty.Name: AvaloniaNameGeneratorFilterByPath
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the Glob pattern to filter the class for which to generate name binding (Default is *)..

StringProperty.Name: AvaloniaNameGeneratorFilterByNamespace
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the Glob pattern to filter the class by namespcace for which to generate name binding (Default is *)..
